valid_articles.Title: YouTube traffic sources affect the same traffic sources, not different ones
valid_articles.Description: YouTube's traffic sources impact similar sources, meaning views from one source don't influence recommendations from another. For instance, homepage recommendations are influenced by viewers watching videos from the homepage and not by external views.
